Class to handle a player wishing to express emotion

emote()

Sends the emotion to everyone in the room, including the player issuing it.

 public void call(Controller con,
                  Player p,
                  StringTokenizer str)
Sends the emotion to everyone in the room, including the player issuing it. As an example: emote smiles would be sent out as: Mercenary smiles
